mapper.select: SELECT lo.lounge_id, le.title, lo.lounge_img_url, lp.created_at AS latest_post_time FROM sugang s JOIN member m ON m.member_id = s.member_id JOIN lounge lo ON lo.lesson_id = s.lesson_id JOIN lesson le ON s.lesson_id = le.lesson_id LEFT JOIN lounge_post lp ON lo.lounge_id = lp.lounge_id AND lp.created_at = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(lp PK_LOUNGE_POST) */ MAX(created_at) FROM lounge_post WHERE lounge_id = lo.lounge_id ) WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND s.online_yn = 0 AND s.lounge_yn = 1
